summary:
Extends Morrowloot gameplay to Dawnguard\'s Revered and Legendary dragons, removing Daedric-tier drops from them.

Does NOT require Morrowloot or Morrowloot - N\'wah Edition
descriptionHtml:
[u][b]Morrowloot - An Unofficial Dawnguard Patch[/b][/u]
[b]DOES NOT REQUIRE MORROWLOOT or MORROWLOOT - N\'WAH EDITION[/b]
[b]DOES REQUIRE DAWNGUARD[/b]

[u]Description[/u]
Morrowloot is a cool mod, it actually forces people to explore the gameworld to find quality items. However, Dawnguard adds in sort of an easy-mode once Revered and Legendary Dragons start spawning, by containing Daedric-level drops, thereby making it really easy to farm money and Daedric gear.

This mod extends Morrowloot functionality to those two dragons, removing all Daedric drops from them, thereby forcing you to once again continue exploring Skyrim to obtain high-quality drops.

It does NOT use Morrowloot or Morrowloot - N\'Wah edition as a master. But I recommend you download either one of those (Morrowloot if you\'re a true fan, N\'Wah if you\'re a goddamn cheater) to enhance your Skyrim experience.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/44212/?]Morrowloot[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19416/?]Morrowloot - N\'Wah Edition[/url]

[u]Installation[/u]
Use NMM or MO to download and install if you use either one, or simply download and extract the esp file to your Data directory.

[u]Uninstallation[/u]
NMM/MO: Untick Morrowloot Dawnguard Unofficial from your load order
Manual: Remove from the data directory

[u]Credits:[/u]
Trainwiz - For Morrowloot and allowing me to publish this mod under the Morrowloot moniker.
author: Scyantific
